titles.title: Student Loan Interest Deduction bill
Make College Affordable Act of 2001
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to make higher education more affordable by providing a full tax deduction for higher education expenses and interest on student loans.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 1/31/2001--Introduced. Make College Affordable Act of 2001 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow the deduction of qualified higher education expenses and interest on qualified higher education loans. Sets forth a per student limitation, a per taxpayer limitation, and a limitation based on modified adjusted gross income.
